title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 6F.53 - Supplementary Distance Plaque (W7-3aP)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 6F.53 - Supplementary Distance Plaque (W7-3aP)

State Regulations
INSERT the following paragraph: Guidance: 04A Distances shown on a Supplementary Distance plaque
should be: A. To the nearest quarter
mile, if less than one mile; B. To
the nearest half mile if between one mile and three miles; and
C. To the nearest whole mile, if more than
three miles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
6F.53

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
